name: Violin Paradise
description:
Violin Paradise is a game designed for up to four people. Players can choose to be a conductor, violinist, violist or cellist as they are tasked with performing some of the most beautiful classical pieces in history.

  • Solo or up to four-people ensemble, you can always experience brand-new performing enjoyment.
  • A simple but sophisticated control.
  • More than 50 various pieces of compositions to be selected.
  • Abundant splendid visual effects, which will come out increasingly while your performance improves.
